alert.note: Alert for Montcalm (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 9:52PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Montcalm County through 1115 PM EDT... At 951 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southwest of Howard City, or 12 miles east of Newaygo, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stanton... Howard City... Edmore... Carson City... Lakeview... Crystal... Sidney... McBride... Pierson... Langston... Westville... Cedar Lake... Entrican... Amble... Six Lakes... Trufant... Vestaburg... Coral... Wyman... Butternut... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
